@package Leibniz
@version 0.1.0.0


module Leibniz.Constants

-- | Ye old faithful constant.
π :: Floating f => f

-- | Let's not start a flamewar.
τ :: Floating f => f


module Leibniz.Trigonometry
todeg :: RealFloat f => f -> f
torad :: RealFloat f => f -> f
